subject: Tennis
Golf
lead_paragraph: In the aftermath of his most thrilling triumph, Tiger Woods is going back to the operating table. On the heels of his most shocking defeat, Roger Federer is preparing to face the serrated specter of Rafael Nadal.
snippet: In the aftermath of his most thrilling triumph, Tiger Woods is going back to the operating table. On the heels of his most shocking defeat, Roger Federer is preparing to face the serrated specter of Rafael Nadal.
